title: Biosafety Labs: New Threats - Chemical, Biological & Nuclear
description: The National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Diseases (NIAID) plans to establish a network of new biodefense labs to conduct research on vaccines, diagnostic tests, and therapeutic agents to mitigate the deadly consequences of a biological terrorist attack. The network will consist of two National Biocontainment (BSL-4) Laboratories and ten Regional Biocontainment (BSL-3) Laboratories
